languages.text: "Но главное, что я не могу видеть себя — арбитра, который трещит по швам. Который без своего пса превращается в руину. Который..." {n}Соломон судорожно выдыхает.{/n} "Больше не верит, что Лекс Империалис торжествует хоть где-то".

"But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."
languages.original_text: "Но главное, что я не могу видеть себя — арбитра, который трещит по швам. Который без своего пса превращается в руину. Который..." {n}Соломон судорожно выдыхает.{/n} "Больше не верит, что Лекс Империалис торжествует хоть где-то".

traits.locale_text: "But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."

"But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."

"But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."

"But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."

"But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."

languages.text: 「だけど、何よりも耐えがたいのは、ほころびかけているアービトレイターとしての自分を見ることだ。犬がいなければ無様に崩れ落ちる自分を。それと…」{n}ソロモーンは、かすれたため息を漏らした。{/n}「レックス・インペリアはどこにでも通用するとは、もはや信じられなくなってしまった自分を」
languages.original_text: "But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."

traits.locale_text: 「だけど、何よりも耐えがたいのは、ほころびかけているアービトレイターとしての自分を見ることだ。犬がいなければ無様に崩れ落ちる自分を。それと…」{n}ソロモーンは、かすれたため息を漏らした。{/n}「レックス・インペリアはどこにでも通用するとは、もはや信じられなくなってしまった自分を」

languages.text: "Aber vor allem kann ich mich selbst nicht mehr sehen – ein Arbitrator, der völlig aus den Fugen geraten ist. Der ohne seinen Hund zu einem Wrack wird. Der ..." {n}Solomorne seufzt kehlig.{/n} "Der nicht mehr glaubt, dass das Lex Imperia irgendwo noch Bestand hat."
languages.original_text: "But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."

traits.locale_text: "Aber vor allem kann ich mich selbst nicht mehr sehen – ein Arbitrator, der völlig aus den Fugen geraten ist. Der ohne seinen Hund zu einem Wrack wird. Der ..." {n}Solomorne seufzt kehlig.{/n} "Der nicht mehr glaubt, dass das Lex Imperia irgendwo noch Bestand hat."

languages.text: « Mais surtout, je ne supporte plus de me voir ainsi, un arbitrator complètement désaxé. Un homme qui s'effondre sans son chien. Qui... {n}Solomorne laisse échapper un soupir rauque.{/n} Qui ne croit plus que la Lex Imperialis puisse un jour régner partout. »
languages.original_text: "But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."

traits.locale_text: « Mais surtout, je ne supporte plus de me voir ainsi, un arbitrator complètement désaxé. Un homme qui s'effondre sans son chien. Qui... {n}Solomorne laisse échapper un soupir rauque.{/n} Qui ne croit plus que la Lex Imperialis puisse un jour régner partout. »

languages.text: «Pero por encima de todo, ya no puedo seguir mirándome a mí mismo, un Arbitrator que se deshace por las costuras. Que se viene abajo sin su perro. Que...». {n}Solomorne deja escapar un suspiro.{/n} «Que ya no cree que la Lex Imperialis prevalezca en ninguna parte».
languages.original_text: "But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."

traits.locale_text: «Pero por encima de todo, ya no puedo seguir mirándome a mí mismo, un Arbitrator que se deshace por las costuras. Que se viene abajo sin su perro. Que...». {n}Solomorne deja escapar un suspiro.{/n} «Que ya no cree que la Lex Imperialis prevalezca en ninguna parte».

languages.text: “但最重要的是，我再也受不了我自己了。这个法务官已经无法继续保持理智了，狗不见了，他就变成了个疯子。而且，他……”{n}索罗蒙发出了嘶哑的叹息。{/n}“他已经不再相信帝国法典的权威。”
languages.original_text: "But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."

traits.locale_text: “但最重要的是，我再也受不了我自己了。这个法务官已经无法继续保持理智了，狗不见了，他就变成了个疯子。而且，他……”{n}索罗蒙发出了嘶哑的叹息。{/n}“他已经不再相信帝国法典的权威。”

languages.text: "Hepsi bir yana aynada kendime bakamaz oldum. Tek gördüğüm, paramparça olmak üzere olan bir Yargıcı. Köpeği yanında olmadıkça bir hiç olan..." {n}Solomorne, perişan hâlde iç çekiyor.{/n} "Artık Lex İmperialis'in üstünlüğüne inanmayan biri."
languages.original_text: "But, above all else, I cannot bear to look at myself — an Arbitrator who is coming apart at the seams. Who turns into a wreck without his dog. Who..." {n}Solomorne releases a ragged sigh.{/n} "Who no longer believes that the Lex Imperialis prevails anywhere at all."

traits.locale_text: "Ama hepsi bir yana aynada kendime bakamaz oldum. Tek gördüğüm paramparça olmak üzere bir Yargıcı. Köpeği yanında olmadıkça bir hiçten farkı kalmayan..." {n}Solomorne perişan hâlde iç çeker.{/n} "Artık Lex İmperialis'in üstünlüğüne inanmayan biri.
